all.body:
* feat: add git.md

* Update mkdocs.yml

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* fix(git): upd installation guide for macOS

Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <h.dwwwwww@gmail.com>

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* fix(git): apply suggestions

- 在“配置用户信息”小节中添加了提示，提醒用户在配置时将相关内容替换为自己的信息；
- 修正了一些语言表述的问题；

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* feat(git): add branch merge

- 添加了分支合并内容；
- 更改了示例中不规范的 commit 信息，为读者留下正面教材；
- 更改了前面的一些语言表述。

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* feat(git): add resolving conflict while merging

- 添加了解决合并冲突的内容；
- 修正了一些格式问题。

* add images of git

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* docs[git.md]: 添加了 Windows 下 Git 的安装方式

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* Update mkdocs.yml

* Update note2

* Update git.md

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* feat(htc): add git usage

* fix(htc): update contribution steps

Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <h.dwwwwww@gmail.com>

* feat(git): add remote management

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* fix(git): vi -> vim

* feat(git): add an external link

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* Update docs/intro/htc.md

Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <h.dwwwwww@gmail.com>

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <h.dwwwwww@gmail.com>

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <h.dwwwwww@gmail.com>

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Yufan You <y___o___u@126.com>

* fix(git): apply suggestions

- 添加了 git add -A 命令的用法。
- 修改了配置文件部分的表述，删除了配置文件存放位置的相关内容。

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* fix(git): update git config

- 修改了 git config 部分的一些表述；
- Git 中最高级的通用配置文件实践中似乎并不常用（更常用的是全局配置），将该配置文件的内容从正文移到了脚注部分。

* feat(git): add set-url and get-url

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* fix(git): fix typo

Co-authored-by: ksyx <18738953+ksyx@users.noreply.github.com>

* fix(git): fix format

* feat(git): add squash merge

* feat(git): add rebase merge

* feat(git): add local branch track remote branch

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <i@xeonacid.xyz>

* fix: typo

* style: format markdown files with remark-lint

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: ksyx <18738953+ksyx@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: ksyx <18738953+ksyx@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: ksyx <18738953+ksyx@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: ksyx <18738953+ksyx@users.noreply.github.com>

* Revert "Update docs/tools/git.md" (--global)

This reverts commit 01f33aae48d7d2aee07c7c30b3f8aede0bf60acf.

* Update docs/tools/git.md

Co-authored-by: ksyx <18738953+ksyx@users.noreply.github.com>

* Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Yufan You <ouuansteve@gmail.com>

* feat(git): add connecting to remote repo via ssh

* fix(git): some minor changes

* fix(git): add .gitignore and minor changes in expressions

* feat(git): add git push --force-with-lease

Co-authored-by: Yufan You <ouuansteve@gmail.com>

* feat(git): add a link to GitHub Docs

use GitHub Docs as tutorial to connect to GitHub via ssh

* fix(git): translate the output into English

Co-authored-by: Early <lin_erli@outlook.com>

Co-authored-by: 24OI-bot <15963390+24OI-bot@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <h.dwwwwww@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: 夜轮_NachtgeistW <NachtgeistW@protonmail.com>
Co-authored-by: 夜轮_NachtgeistW <35161925+NachtgeistW@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Nano <nanoapezlk@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: mgt <mgt@oi-wiki.org>
Co-authored-by: Yufan You <y___o___u@126.com>
Co-authored-by: ksyx <18738953+ksyx@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Xeonacid <i@xeonacid.xyz>
Co-authored-by: Yufan You <ouuansteve@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Early <lin_erli@outlook.com>

all.message: style: format markdown files with remark-lint
feat(htc): add requirement for pr and commit
style: format markdown files with remark-lint
Merge branch 'refactor-6.17' of https://github.com/NachtgeistW/OI-wiki into refactor-6.17
style: format markdown files with remark-lint
添加了 htc.md 的一个 ref
fix #2108 修复了「你们到底是个什么 Wiki 啊，format 写在 htc，htc 写在 FAQ，FAQ 写在 about，about 写在 Getting Started（」的问题
style: format markdown files with remark-lint
style: format markdown files with remark-lint
